name: FullCodePress.com - Color Directory
description:
Extra colourful styles for www.fullcodepress.com with photos by Cobalt123.

For photo terms of use see: http://www.flickr.com/people/cobalt/

There's a few different colour schemes which I've applied to different pages in the site. This was fun to do and I've learnt heaps about user styles and how the -moz specific stuff works :)

- Reb AT reb.net.nz
